title: Person Of Interest Office Monkey (Season 3 Episode 2)
author: xFastHax
comment: I would NOT want to be the supervisor giving Shaw her annual performance review!
I like Shaws look when she's thinking about something
reese and shaw used to flirt, now it's all root and shaw! how did THAT happen?
Like Suits became Skirts, Person of Interest became Personal Interest.  Gripping a man's bicep from a squirt and he recoils in pain.  Jumped the shark.
description:
SHAW BEING WHERE THE ACTION IS...
